xtc.lang.cpp
Class HeaderFileManager.Computed

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager.Include
      xtc.lang.cpp.HeaderFileManager.Computed
Enclosing class:
HeaderFileManager
protected class HeaderFileManager.Computed
extends HeaderFileManager.Include

The descriptor for a computed header. Because macros can be implicitly conditional, a computed header may expand to multiple header file names.

Field Summary

          The list of header file names.

          A pointer to the presence condition manager.

          Whether the computed header was from an #include_next directive.
